definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.
sentences.chinese: 不要切慕黑夜，就是衆民在本處被除滅的時候。

sentences.english: So David went on his way, and Saul returned home.
sentences.chinese: 於是大衛起行，掃羅回他的本處去了。

sentences.english: Let's now take the first steps past text processing, narrowly construed.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們來詳細分析文本處理的首要步驟。

sentences.english: Zhao big was brought to the mound in, and money 2 see each other again.
sentences.chinese: 趙大被帶到冢本處，與錢二相見。

sentences.english: The information in the public registers will also be posted on the website of this Department.
sentences.chinese: 此外，公衆登記冊的資料亦會於本處網頁公佈。

sentences.english: We are seeing an increasing number of contextual tools entering the consumer market.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經看到越來越多的文本處理工具進入消費市場。

sentences.english: Then the man took her up upon an ass, and the man rose up, and gat him unto his place.
sentences.chinese: 那人便將她馱在驢上，起身回本處去了。

sentences.english: Then the man put her on his donkey and set out for home.
sentences.chinese: 那人便將她馱在驢上，起身回本處去了。

sentences.english: You may be asked to provide further documentation.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，本處得要求臺端提供別的文件。

definition: to expose (e.g., wrongdoing)/to accuse (in court)/to impeach/to denounce
to apply for (a subsidy, unemployment benefit etc)
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
